statusLine.command: input=$(cat); branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" describe --tags --exact-match 2>/dev/null || git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); printf '\033[01;32m%s@%s\033[00m:\033[01;34m%s\033[00m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf ' \033[01;33m(%s)\033[00m' "$branch"
